mapper.select: SELECT * FROM( SELECT id, date_format( str_to_date(view_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),'%Y-%m-%d' ) as "views", count( * ) as "count" FROM tb_goods_view_count WHERE goods_id = #{goods_id} GROUP BY date_format( str_to_date(view_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),'%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY view_time desc LIMIT 10 ) a ORDER BY a.views asc
